Data Fields
sys_sudo_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » System Devices

Data structure to unlock the security word features. More...

#include <sys.h>

Detailed Description

This data structure is used with I_SYS_UNLOCK. A successful request will unlock the security features (see security in sys_info_t) of the device giving access to certain parts of the device.

Data Fields

u8 key [32]
 The password used to unlock the device.
